name: E. Do You Love Your Hero and His Two-Hit Multi-Target Attacks
statement:
Akito decided to study a new powerful spell. Since it possesses
immeasurable strength, it certainly requires a lot of space and careful
preparation. For this, Akito went out into the field. Let’s represent
the field as a Cartesian coordinate system.For the spell, Akito needs to
place 0
le n
le 500 staffs at in the field such that there will be (i, j) such that 1
le i < j
le n and
rho(i, j) = d(i, j).Here, for two points with integer coordinates a =
(x_a, y_a) and b = (x_b, y_b),
rho(a, b) =
sqrt{(x_a - x_b)^2 + (y_a - y_b)^2} and d(a, b) = |x_a - x_b| + |y_a -
y_b|.
file_name: D:\scoala\RESEARCH\MLCP\01_CODEFORCES_DATASET\DIV3\E. Do You Love Your Hero and His Two-Hit Multi-Target Attacks .json
